title.narrative: Laos Human Rights Technical Cooperation Fund

description.narrative: The Laos Human Rights Technical Cooperation Fund is a small grants program managed by the Political/Economic Section of the Australian Embassy to the Lao PDR, supporting a range of activities to promote human rights, the rule of law and improved governance. The program is a result of the third bilateral Human Rights Dialogue with Laos (April 2012), with the Australian delegation recommended that funding be made available to establish a Human Rights Technical Cooperation Program for Laos. The program will link with Australian supported facilities promoting human rights cooperation with China and Vietnam. The total value of this initiative is $0.2 million over 2 years, starting 2013-14.
